p: In CCl 4-treated rats, CCl 4 caused a significant elevation of AST, ALT, AP, and total and direct bilirubin, and caused a significant lowering of total protein (p<0.05) ( Table-3). TVH, OVOE, and HEM significantly ameliorated these changes. TVH was more potent than OVEO, and HEM was more potent than TVH and OVEO individually (p<0.05). Regarding kidney function and serum electrolytes, CCl 4 significantly elevated blood urea, creatinine, sodium, potassium, and calcium, while TVH, OVOE, and HEM significantly decreased all these parameters.
